articles.title: Twitter still a tenant at CapitaGreen, says building's developer after reports that staff were asked to leave - CNA
articles.description: Twitter's Asia-Pacific headquarters are at CapitaGreen building in Singapore.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: Twitter remains a tenant at CapitaGreen, the building in Singapore that houses its Asia-Pacific headquarters, even as staff were asked to clear the office by Wednesday evening (Jan 11).

articles.author: Yoolim Lee, Sing Yee Ong
articles.title: Twitter tells Asia HQ staff to clear desks, work from home - The Star Online
articles.description: Workers at Twitter Inc.’s Singapore office were told to empty out their desks and vacate the premises, said people familiar with the situation, as Elon Musk continues to pare expenses around the globe.

articles.title: PAG, Mapletree to buy Hong Kong's Goldin Financial Global Centre for US$713 million - CNA

articles.title: North American semiconductor industry will prevent 'over-reliance' on Asia: Trudeau - National | Globalnews.ca - Global News
articles.description: Canada, the U.S. and Mexico agreed this week to boost semiconductor output and investment in the continent to compete with Asia, which has dominated the industry.
